instructions: put the dinner plate on the table cloth
put the salad plate on the dinner plate
put a napkin on the salad plate
put a wine glass on the top right hand corner of the table cloth
put the water glass on the bottom right hand corner of the wine glass
put a salad fork on the left of the dinner plate, with the head pointing to the top
put a dinner fork on the right of the salad fork with the head pointing to the top
put a dinner knife on the right of the dinner plate, with the head pointing to the top
put the soup spoon on the right of the dinner knife, with the head pointing to the top
